activities.name: HZN_NSIP_Data_Copy

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH 
StringFields(ID, Vernum, ProjectName, ProjectStatus, ExamTimetablePublishStatus, 
			Sector, ProjectType, Stage, CaseReference, ProjectLocation, ProjectEmailAddress, 
			TwitterAccountName, Region, Easting, Northing, Transboundary, WelshLanguage, 
			ExASize, MapZoomLevel, ProjectDescription, SoS, TenE) AS
       (SELECT 
			Id, VerNum, [8], [23], [26], [17], [18], [19], [10], [2], [11], [15], [22], [12], [13], [28], [24], [20], [14], [9], [21], [27]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, ValStr 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361638 
				AND AttrID IN (2, 8, 23, 26, 17, 10, 11, 15, 18, 19, 22, 12, 13, 28, 24, 20, 14, 9, 21, 27)) AS Strings 
			PIVOT (MAX(ValStr) FOR AttrID IN ([2], [8], [23], [26], [17], [10], [11], [15], [18], [19], [22], [12], [13], [28], [24], [20], [14], [9], [21], [27])) AS StringsPivot),

DateFields(ID, Vernum, DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite, DateOfDCOAcceptance, AnticipatedDateOfSubmission, 
			AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific, DateOfDCOSubmission, DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen, 
			DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose, DateRRepAppearOnWebsite, ConfirmedStartOfExamination, 
			DateTimeExaminationEnds, Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate, Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline, 
			DateOfRecommendations, ConfirmedDateOfDecision, Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
			DateProjectWithdrawn, Section46Notification, DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject, 
			ScreeningOpinionSought, ScreeningOpinionIssued, ScopingOpinionSought, 
			ScopingOpinionIssued, DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision, DateSection58NoticeReceived, 
			PreliminaryMeetingStartDate, DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,	DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation, 
			DeadlineForDecision, JRPeriodEndDate, ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
			) AS
       (SELECT 
			Id,VerNum,[3],[13],[5],[4],[12],[15],[16],[18],[21],[22],[24],[27],[25],[28],[30],[6],[11],[2], [7], [8], [9], [10], [14], [19], [20], [23], [26], [29], [31], [17]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, ValDate 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361641 
				AND AttrID IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 11, 12, 13, 15, 16, 18, 21, 22, 24, 25, 27, 28, 30, 2, 7, 8,9, 10, 14, 19, 20, 23, 26, 29, 31, 17)) AS Dates 
			PIVOT (MAX(ValDate) FOR AttrID IN ([3], [4], [5], [6], [11], [12], [13], [15], [16], [18], [21], [22], [24], [25], [27], [28], [30], [2], [7], [8], [9], [10], [14], [19], [20], [23], [26], [29], [31], [17])) AS DatesPivot),

TextFields(ID, Vernum, Summary) AS
       (SELECT Id,VerNum,[9]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, CAST(ValLong AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS TextField 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361638 
				AND AttrID IN (9)) AS Texts 
			PIVOT (MAX(TextField) FOR AttrID IN ([9])) AS TextsPivot),

StringFields_Applicant(ID, Vernum, PromoterName, ApplicantFirstName, ApplicantLastName, ApplicantEmailAddress, ApplicantWebAddress, ApplicantPhoneNumber, AddressLine1, AddressLine2, AddressTown, AddressCounty, PostCode) AS
       (SELECT Id, VerNum, [19], [3], [4], [10], [12], [11], [5], [6], [7], [8], [9]
	   FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, ValStr 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361642 
				AND AttrID IN (19, 3, 4, 10, 12, 18, 11, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9)) AS Strings 
			PIVOT (MAX(ValStr) FOR AttrID IN ([19], [3], [4], [10], [12], [18], [11], [5], [6], [7], [8], [9])) AS StringsPivot),

TextFields_Applicant(ID, Vernum, ApplicantDescriptionOfProject) AS
       (SELECT Id, VerNum, [18]
       FROM 
			(SELECT Id, VerNum, AttrID, CAST(ValLong AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS TextField 
			FROM LLAttrData 
			WHERE 
				DefID = 12361642 
				AND AttrID IN (18)) AS Texts 
			PIVOT (MAX(TextField) FOR AttrID IN ([18])) AS TextsPivot),

StringFields_Case_Manager(DataId, ContactID, ContactDetails, TypeOfInvolvement) AS
       (SELECT d.DataId AS DataId, ll1.ValStr AS [ContactID], ll2.ValStr AS [ContactDetails], ll3.ValStr AS [TypeOfInvolvement]
       FROM DTree d
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll1 ON d.DataId = ll1.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll2 ON d.DataId = ll2.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll3 ON d.DataId = ll3.Id
       WHERE
		   ll1.DefId = 95501 AND ll1.AttrId = 20
		   AND ll2.DefId = 95501 AND ll2.AttrId = 19
		   AND ll3.DefId = 95501 AND ll3.AttrId = 3 AND ll3.ValStr = 'Case Manager'
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll2.ParentKeyId
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll3.ParentKeyId),

StringFields_Case_Officer(DataId, ContactID, ContactDetails, TypeOfInvolvement) AS
       (SELECT d.DataId AS DataId, ll1.ValStr AS [ContactID], ll2.ValStr AS [ContactDetails], ll3.ValStr AS [TypeOfInvolvement]
       FROM DTree d
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll1 ON d.DataId = ll1.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll2 ON d.DataId = ll2.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll3 ON d.DataId = ll3.Id
       WHERE
		   ll1.DefId = 95501 AND ll1.AttrId = 20
		   AND ll2.DefId = 95501 AND ll2.AttrId = 19
		   AND ll3.DefId = 95501 AND ll3.AttrId = 3 AND ll3.ValStr = 'Case Officer'
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll2.ParentKeyId
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll3.ParentKeyId),


StringFields_Inspector(DataId, ContactID, ContactDetails, TypeOfInvolvement) AS
       (SELECT d.DataId AS DataId, ll1.ValStr AS [ContactID], ll2.ValStr AS [ContactDetails], ll3.ValStr AS [TypeOfInvolvement]
       FROM DTree d
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll1 ON d.DataId = ll1.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll2 ON d.DataId = ll2.Id
		   INNER JOIN llattrdata ll3 ON d.DataId = ll3.Id
       WHERE
		   ll1.DefId = 95501 AND ll1.AttrId = 20
		   AND ll2.DefId = 95501 AND ll2.AttrId = 19
		   AND ll3.DefId = 95501 AND ll3.AttrId = 3 AND ll3.ValStr = 'Inspector'
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll2.ParentKeyId
		   AND ll1.ParentKeyId = ll3.ParentKeyId)
       
SELECT 
	nsipcase.CreateDate AS CaseCreatedDate,
	s.ProjectName,
	s.ProjectStatus,
	s.ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
	s.Sector,
	s.ProjectType,
	s.Stage,
	s.CaseReference,
	s.ProjectLocation,
	s.ProjectEmailAddress,
	s.TwitterAccountName,
	s.Region,
	s.Easting,
	s.Northing,
	s.Transboundary,
	s.WelshLanguage,
	s.ExASize,
	s.MapZoomLevel,
	s.ProjectDescription,
	s.SoS,
	s.TenE,
	d.DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
	d.DateOfDCOAcceptance,
	d.AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
	d.DateOfDCOSubmission,
	d.DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
	d.DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
	d.DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
	d.ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
	d.DateTimeExaminationEnds,
	d.Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
	d.Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
	d.DateOfRecommendations,
	d.ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
	d.Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
	d.DateProjectWithdrawn,
	d.Section46Notification,
	d.DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
	d.ScreeningOpinionSought,
	d.ScreeningOpinionIssued,
	d.ScopingOpinionSought,
	d.ScopingOpinionIssued,
	d.DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
	d.DateSection58NoticeReceived,
	d.PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
	d.DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
	d.DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
	d.DeadlineForDecision,
	d.JRPeriodEndDate,
	d.ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
	t.Summary,
	sa.PromoterName,
	sa.ApplicantFirstName,
	sa.ApplicantLastName,
	sa.AddressLine1,
	sa.AddressLine2,
	sa.AddressTown,
	sa.AddressCounty,
	sa.PostCode,
	sa.ApplicantEmailAddress,
	sa.ApplicantWebAddress,
	sa.ApplicantPhoneNumber,
	ta.ApplicantDescriptionOfProject
FROM 
	Horizon_CaseReference cr 
		INNER JOIN Horizon_TypeOfCase toc ON cr.CaseTypeId = toc.ID
		INNER JOIN DTree nsipcase ON cr.CaseNodeId = nsipcase.DataID
		INNER JOIN StringFields s ON nsipcase.DataID = s.ID
		INNER JOIN DateFields d ON nsipcase.DataID = d.ID
		INNER JOIN TextFields t ON nsipcase.DataID = t.ID
		INNER JOIN StringFields_Applicant sa ON nsipcase.DataID = sa.ID
		INNER JOIN TextFields_Applicant ta ON nsipcase.DataID = ta.ID
WHERE
       toc.CaseworkType = 'NSIP'
	   and s.CaseReference = 'EN010118'
ORDER BY
	s.CaseReference

activities.name: Picasso_Data_Copy

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
	C.[CaseNumber] as case_reference_number
	,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(C.[CaseNumber],'W/', ''), 'D/', ''), 'BC', ''), 'H/', ''), 'Z/', ''), 'EN', ''), 'Y/','') as appeal_reference_number
	,C.Application_Description as development_or_allegation
	,CL.[Subject] as apellant
	,C.[Site_Address] as site_address_line_1
	,COALESCE(C.[Site_Postcode], C.[Site_nearestPostcode]) as site_address_postcode
	,C.[Application_Reference] as lpa_application_reference
	,0 as redetermined
	,0 as has_bespoke_target
	,'No' as enforcement_linked
	,CAST(C.Timeline4_CaseTurnedAwayDate as date) as appeal_turned_away_date
	,CAST(C.Timeline4_CaseWithdrawnDate as date) as appeal_withdrawn_date
	,CAST(C.Deadline as date) as target_date
	,'No' as is_kiosk
	,0 as in_measure
	,case 
		when C.Timeline1_ValidationDate is not null and C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate is not null and t.target_days is not null then
			case
				when datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate ) > t.target_days then 'Fail'
				else 'Pass'
			end
		else 'NA'
	end as was_target_hit
	,case
		when C.Timeline1_ValidationDate is not null and C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate is not null and t.target_days is not null then
			case
				when datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) > t.target_days - 28 then 'Fail'
				else 'Pass'
			end
		else 'NA'
	end as was_legacy_target_hit
	,CASE ISNULL(rc.AppNum, 0) 
		WHEN 0 THEN 
			CASE ISNULL(rsp.CaseReference, 0)
				WHEN 0 THEN 0
				ELSE 
					CASE rsp.ReadingStatusValue
						WHEN 'Unread' THEN 0
						ELSE 1
						END
				END
		ELSE 
			CASE rc.[Reader Name] 
				WHEN 'UNREAD' THEN 0 
				ELSE 1 
				END 
		END AS is_reading_case
	,C.Offices_Floorspace as FloorSpaceInSquareMetres 
	,CASE C.Preferred_Preference
			WHEN 'Written Representations' THEN 'WR'
			WHEN 'Hearing' THEN 'IH'
			WHEN 'Inquiry' THEN 'LI'
			WHEN 'No Preference' THEN 'Un'
			ELSE 'NA'		
		END as AppellantProcedure

	,CAST(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate as date) as AppealsDocumentsComplete
	,CASE
		WHEN C.Timeline4_CaseTurnedAwayDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'TA'
		WHEN C.Timeline4_CaseWithdrawnDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'WD'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Allowed' THEN 'A'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Dismissed' THEN 'D'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Split Decision' THEN 'S'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Invalid' THEN 'In'
		ELSE CASE ISNULL(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate, '1899-12-31')
				WHEN '1899-12-31' THEN NULL
				ELSE 'U'
			END
	END AS DecisionCode
	,CASE
		WHEN C.Timeline4_CaseTurnedAwayDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'Turned Away'
		WHEN C.Timeline4_CaseWithdrawnDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'Appeal Withdrawn'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Allowed' THEN 'Allowed'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Dismissed' THEN 'Dismissed'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Split Decision' THEN 'Split Decision'
		WHEN C.Application_CaseDecision = 'Invalid' THEN 'Invalid'
		ELSE 
			CASE ISNULL(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate, '1899-12-31')
				WHEN '1899-12-31' THEN NULL
				ELSE ISNULL(C.Application_CaseDecision, 'Unknown')
			END
	END AS DecisionCodeDesc
	,CAST(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate as date) as appeal_decided_date
	,'Picaso' as source_system
	,C.[Programming_SiteVisitTime]  as SiteVisitTime
	,CAST(C.[Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundDue] as date) as [Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundDue]
	,CAST(C.[Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundPublished] as date) as [Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundPublished]
	,CAST(C.[Timeline5_AppellantStatementPublished] as date) as [Timeline5_AppellantStatementPublished]
	,CAST(C.[Timeline5_AppellantStatementDue] as date) as [Timeline5_AppellantStatementDue]
	,C.[Ownership_Permission]
	,C.Programming_SiteVisitType as event_code
	,cast(C.Timeline4_LpaApplDate as date) as lpa_application_date
	,cast(C.Timeline4_LpaApplDecisionDate as date) as lpa_decision_date
	,l.[ONS Code] as ons_code
	,coalesce(C.Site_Address, C.Site_GeneratedSiteAddress) as site_address
	,case 
		when job.[Procedure] = 'ID' then 1
		when C.Programming_SiteVisitType = 'NSV' then 1
		when C.Programming_SiteVisitType = 'VSV' then 1
		else 0
		end as is_virtual_event
	,'No' as prior_approval
	,cast(C.Timeline3_FinalCommentsDueDate as date) as final_comments_due_date
	,'Portal' as appeal_source_indicator
INTO #Picaso
FROM ODT.CASEDOC C
	LEFT OUTER JOIN ODT.CLIENT CL ON C.InvolvedParty_ID = CL.ID

	--CaseType default to s78 for NULL rows
	left outer join live.dim_appeal_type as appet
		on	ISNULL(Application_CaseType, '100-MVP') = appet.appeal_type_code_picaso
	left outer join live.dim_target as t
		on	case appet.appeal_type_code 
				when '834-RPC' then 'PA'
				when '840-OCF' then 'PA'
				when '841-PRI' then 'PA'
				when '842-RAP' then 'PA'
				when '845-NDE' then 'PA'
				when '847-DIS' then 'PA'
				when '851-LBC' then 'PA'
				when '844-CON' then 'PA'
				when '851-CAV' then 'CAS'
				when '3566-HAS' then 'HAS'
				else appet.appeal_type_code
		end = t.appeal_type_code
		and CASE C.Preferred_Preference
			WHEN 'Written Representations' THEN 'WR'
			WHEN 'Hearing' THEN 'IH'
			WHEN 'Inquiry' THEN 'LI'
			WHEN 'No Preference' THEN 'Un'
			ELSE 'NA'		
		END = t.procedure_code

	left outer join load.vw_iss_job job
		on C.CaseNumber = job.Job

	left join load.Reading rc 
		ON REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CaseNumber],'W/', ''), 'D/', ''), 'BC', ''), 'H/', ''), 'Z/', ''), 'EN', ''), 'Y/','') = rc.AppNum

	left join load.reading_sp_list rsp 
		on REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CaseNumber],'W/', ''), 'D/', ''), 'BC', ''), 'H/', ''), 'Z/', ''), 'EN', ''), 'Y/','') = rsp.CaseReference

	left outer join bis.lpa_codes_with_ons l
		on C.Application_LPA = l.[LPA Code]

	left outer join  ODT.REF_CONFIG CFG3 on C.[Status_ID] = CFG3.ID
		left outer join Live.dim_processing_state_combined as ps
			on	CFG3.[Name] = ps.processing_state_p

	where 
		C.[CaseNumber] not like ('%4001600%') -- duplicated case pending decision when horizon was turned off. Replaced by 3271676
		and	C.CreationDate > '2019-08-06 08:47:21.000' --anything earlier is a test case
		and C.MarkedForDelete = 0 
		and C.CaseNumber NOT LIKE 'EN%' --erroneous case names
		and C.CaseNumber <> 'General' --erroneous case name
		and ps.open_or_closed <> 'Open' --MP-2366: exclude Picaso Open cases as they were added to Horizon before Picaso shutdown

select 
	ad1.appeal_reference_number
	,cast(coalesce(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, c.Timeline1_CaseStartDate, C.CreationDate) as date) as valid_date 
	,cast(C.CreationDate as date) as received_date
	,cast(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate as date) as event_date
	,cast(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate as date) as [start_date]
	,cast(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate as date) as decided_date
	,cast(sub.first_submission_date as date) as first_submission_date
	,cast(sub.last_submission_date AS date) as last_submission_date

	/* For closed cases, take DecisionIssuedDate or maximum available other date as end date */
	,case ps.open_or_closed 
		when 'Closed' then	coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate, (select Max(GimmeSomeDates) from  (values (C.Timeline1_ValidationDate),
																												(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate),
																												(C.Timeline4_caseTurnedAwayDate),
																												(C.Timeline4_caseWithdrawnDate),
																												(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate),
																												(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate),
																												(C.CreationDate)) AS DatesDatesDates(GimmeSomeDates)), C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate)
		else NULL
	end as appeal_end_date
	,p.[procedure_name]
	,lpa.lpa_code
	,lpa.lpa_name
	,appet.appeal_type
	,j.jurisdiction_name as jurisdiction
	,dt.development_type_name as development_type
	,case len(coalesce(ins2.pins_staff_number, ins.pins_staff_number, null))
		when 6 then '00' + cast(ins.pins_staff_number as varchar(8))
		else cast(coalesce(ins2.pins_staff_number, ins.pins_staff_number, null) as varchar(8))
		end as inspector_staff_number

	,case
		when coalesce(ps.open_or_closed_p, 'NA') = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') <= getdate() then 'Closed - Incorrect Processing'
		else coalesce(ps.processing_state, 'No Processing State Associated') 
	end as processing_state

	,sl.spec_level_code as specialism_level_code
	,pr.region as site_postcode_region
	,t.target_source_key
	,co.email_address as case_officer_email

	,case ps.open_or_closed_p
		when 'Closed' then 'Closed'
		when 'Open' then ops.open_processing_stage_name
		else 'No State Available'
	end as open_processing_stage

	/****duration measures******/
	,isnull(case
		when ps.open_or_closed_p = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') = '31-Jan-9999'  then datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, getdate()) / 7.0
		else null
	end,0) as open_valid_to_today_weeks

	,CASE WHEN isnull(case
		when ps.open_or_closed_p = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') = '31-Jan-9999'  then datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, getdate()) / 7.0
		else null
	end,0) <= t.target_weeks THEN 'Within Target'
	ELSE 'Outside Target'
	END as open_valid_to_today_target_status

	,isnull(case
		when ps.open_or_closed_p = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') = '31-Jan-9999' then datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, getdate()) / 7.0
		else null
	end,0) as open_sitting_to_today_weeks
	
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate) / 7.0 as valid_to_start_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate) / 7.0 as valid_to_sitting_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0 as start_to_decision_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0 as valid_to_decision_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.CreationDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0 as received_to_decision_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0 as sitting_to_decision_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate) / 7.0 as start_to_sitting_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.CreationDate, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate) / 7.0 as received_to_valid_weeks

	,isnull(case
		when ps.open_or_closed_p = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') = '31-Jan-9999' then (datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, getdate())) / 7.0
		else null
	end,0) as open_weeks_since_sitting

	,datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, sub.first_submission_date) / 7.0 as sitting_to_first_submission_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, sub.last_submission_date) / 7.0 as sitting_to_last_submission_weeks
	,datediff(day, sub.last_submission_date, Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0 as last_submission_to_decision_weeks

	,live.DATEADDNOWKNOBH(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate+1,t.inspector_personal_target_working_days) AS inspector_personal_target_date
	,case ISNULL(ad1.last_submission_date, '1899-12-31')
		when '1899-12-31' then 'ISS Submission Date missing'
		else
			case 
				when ad1.last_submission_date <= live.DATEADDNOWKNOBH(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate+1,t.inspector_personal_target_working_days) then 'In Target'
				else 'Missed Target'
			 end 
	end as inspector_personal_target_marker

	 --Decision > Submitted > Event > Started > Valid > Received
	 ,case
		when d_s.dim_date_key < d_sd.dim_date_key then 0
			else case
				when d_sd.dim_date_key < d_v.dim_date_key then 0
				else case
					when d_v.dim_date_key < d_r.dim_date_key then 0
					else 1
					end
				end
	 end as date_order_flag

	,isnull(case
		when ps.open_or_closed_p = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') = '31-Jan-9999'  then datediff(day, C.CreationDate, getdate()) / 7.0
		else null
	end,0) as open_received_to_today_weeks

   ,datediff(day, C.CreationDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0 as received_to_end_weeks

   ,isnull(case 
		when ps.open_or_closed_p = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') = '31-Jan-9999'  then datediff(day,C.Timeline1_caseStartDate,getdate())/7.0
		else null
	end,0) as open_start_to_today_weeks
	
	,isnull(case 
		when ps.open_or_closed = 'Open' and coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,  '31-Jan-9999') = '31-Jan-9999'  then datediff(day,sub.last_submission_date,getdate())/7.0
		else null
	end,0) as open_submit_to_today_weeks

	,case isnull(t.GDT_valid_to_start, 0)
		when 0 then 'N/A'
		else
			case coalesce(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, -999)
				when -999 then 'N/A'
				else case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate,-998)
						when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
										when -1 then 'N'
										else 'Y'
										end
						else case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate) / 7.0)
								when -1 then 'N'
								else 'Y'
								end
						end
				end 
		end as was_gdt_VtoS_hit


	,case isnull(t.GDT_start_to_event, 0)
		when 0 then 'N/A'
		else
			case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, -999)
				when -999 then 'N/A'
				else 
					case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate,-997)
						when -997 then case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day,  C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
										when -1 then 'N'
										else 'Y'
										end
						else case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate) / 7.0)
								when -1 then 'N'
								else 'Y'
								end
						end
			end 
		end as was_gdt_StoE_hit

	,case isnull(t.GDT_event_to_decision, 0)
		when 0 then 'N/A'
		else 
			case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, -999)
				when -999 then 'N/A'
				else 
					case coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,-998)
						when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day,  C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
										when -1 then 'N'
										else 'Y'
										end
						else case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0)
								when -1 then 'N'
								else 'Y'
								end
						end
				end 
		end as was_gdt_EtoD_hit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		,case charindex('N-', (case ISNULL(t.GDT_valid_to_start, 0)
			when 0 then 'N/A'
			else
				case coalesce(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, -999)
					when -999 then 'N/A'
					else case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate,-998)
							when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
											when -1 then 'N'
											else 'Y'
											end
							else case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate) / 7.0)
									when -1 then 'N'
									else 'Y'
									end
							end
					end 
			end + '-' 
		+ case isnull(t.GDT_start_to_event, 0)
			when 0 then 'N/A'
			else
				case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, -999)
					when -999 then 'N/A'
					else 
						case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate,-997)
							when -997 then case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day,  C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
											when -1 then 'N'
											else 'Y'
											end
							else case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate) / 7.0)
									when -1 then 'N'
									else 'Y'
									end
							end
				end 
		end + '-' + 
	case isnull(t.GDT_event_to_decision, 0)
		when 0 then 'N/A'
		else 
			case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, -999)
				when -999 then 'N/A'
				else 
					case coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,-998)
						when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day,  C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
										when -1 then 'N'
										else 'Y'
										end
						else case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0)
								when -1 then 'N'
								else 'Y'
								end
						end
				end 
		end + '-'), 1)
			when 0 then --check for Y
				case charindex('N/A-', (case ISNULL(t.GDT_valid_to_start, 0)
			when 0 then 'N/A'
			else
				case coalesce(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, -999)
					when -999 then 'N/A'
					else case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate,-998)
							when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
											when -1 then 'N'
											else 'Y'
											end
							else case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate) / 7.0)
									when -1 then 'N'
									else 'Y'
									end
							end
					end 
			end + '-' 
		+ case isnull(t.GDT_start_to_event, 0)
			when 0 then 'N/A'
			else
				case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, -999)
					when -999 then 'N/A'
					else 
						case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate,-997)
							when -997 then case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day,  C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
											when -1 then 'N'
											else 'Y'
											end
							else case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate) / 7.0)
									when -1 then 'N'
									else 'Y'
									end
							end
				end 
		end + '-' + 
	case isnull(t.GDT_event_to_decision, 0)
		when 0 then 'N/A'
		else 
			case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, -999)
				when -999 then 'N/A'
				else 
					case coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,-998)
						when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day,  C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
										when -1 then 'N'
										else 'Y'
										end
						else case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0)
								when -1 then 'N'
								else 'Y'
								end
						end
				end 
		end + '-'), 1)
					when 0 then 'Y'
					else
						case charindex('Y', (case ISNULL(t.GDT_valid_to_start, 0)
			when 0 then 'N/A'
			else
				case coalesce(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, -999)
					when -999 then 'N/A'
					else case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate,-998)
							when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
											when -1 then 'N'
											else 'Y'
											end
							else case sign(t.GDT_valid_to_start - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_ValidationDate, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate) / 7.0)
									when -1 then 'N'
									else 'Y'
									end
							end
					end 
			end + '-' 
		+ case isnull(t.GDT_start_to_event, 0)
			when 0 then 'N/A'
			else
				case coalesce(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, -999)
					when -999 then 'N/A'
					else 
						case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate,-997)
							when -997 then case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day,  C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
											when -1 then 'N'
											else 'Y'
											end
							else case sign(t.GDT_start_to_event - datediff(day, C.Timeline1_caseStartDate, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate) / 7.0)
									when -1 then 'N'
									else 'Y'
									end
							end
				end 
		end + '-' + 
	case isnull(t.GDT_event_to_decision, 0)
		when 0 then 'N/A'
		else 
			case coalesce(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, -999)
				when -999 then 'N/A'
				else 
					case coalesce(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate,-998)
						when -998 then case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day,  C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, getDate()) / 7.0)
										when -1 then 'N'
										else 'Y'
										end
						else case sign(t.GDT_event_to_decision - datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate) / 7.0)
								when -1 then 'N'
								else 'Y'
								end
						end
				end 
		end + '-'), 1)
							when 0 then 'N/A'
							else 'Y'
							end
					end
			else 'N'
			end as was_gdt_overall_hit

	 ,datediff(day, C.Timeline1_CaseStartDate, sub.last_submission_date) / 7.0 as start_to_last_submission_weeks
	,'Picaso' as source_system
	,datediff(day, C.CreationDate, C.Timeline1_CaseStartDate) / 7.0 as received_to_start_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.CreationDate, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate) / 7.0 as received_to_event_weeks
	,datediff(day, C.Timeline4_LpaApplDecisionDate, C.CreationDate) / 7.0 as lpa_decision_to_received_weeks
	,case when C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate IS NOT NULL then
		case when datediff(day, C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate, coalesce(sub.last_submission_date, getdate())) / 7.0 <= 4.0 then 'Pass' 
		else 'Fail' end 
	else 'NA' end as event_to_submission_target_hit 
	--,P2.case_reference_number
	--,P2.appeal_reference_number
	,P2.development_or_allegation
	,P2.apellant
	,P2.site_address_line_1
	,P2.site_address_postcode
	,P2.lpa_application_reference
	,P2.redetermined
	,P2.has_bespoke_target
	,P2.enforcement_linked
	,P2.appeal_turned_away_date
	,P2.appeal_withdrawn_date
	,P2.target_date
	,P2.is_kiosk
	,P2.in_measure
	,P2.was_target_hit
	,P2.was_legacy_target_hit
	,P2.is_reading_case
	,P2.FloorSpaceInSquareMetres
	,P2.AppellantProcedure
	,P2.AppealsDocumentsComplete
	,P2.DecisionCode
	,P2.DecisionCodeDesc
	,P2.appeal_decided_date
	,P2.source_system
	,P2.SiteVisitTime
	,P2.Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundDue
	,P2.Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundPublished
	,P2.Timeline5_AppellantStatementPublished
	,P2.Timeline5_AppellantStatementDue
	,P2.Ownership_Permission
	,P2.event_code
	,P2.lpa_application_date
	,P2.lpa_decision_date
	,P2.ons_code
	,P2.site_address
	,P2.is_virtual_event
	,P2.prior_approval
	,P2.final_comments_due_date
	,P2.appeal_source_indicator

FROM [ODT].vw_CASEDOC C
	
	left outer join ODT.USER_PROFILE U4 on C.ResponsibleEmployee_ID = U4.ID

	left outer join  ODT.REF_CONFIG CFG3 on C.[Status_ID] = CFG3.ID

	left outer join ODT.case_CORESPONSIBLE COR on C.ID = COR.OWNERID

	left outer join ODT.REF_ORGOBJECT ROO3 on COR.CORESPONSIBLE_ID = ROO3.ID

	inner join Live.dim_appeal_combined ad1
	on replace(replace(C.[caseNumber],'W/', ''), 'D/', '') = ad1.appeal_reference_number

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_v
	on	cast(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate as date) = d_v.[date]

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_r
	on	cast(C.CreationDate as date) = d_r.date

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_s
	on	cast(C.Timeline_SiteVisitDate as date) = d_s.date

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_sd
	on	cast(C.Timeline1_caseStartDate as date) = d_sd.date

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_dd
	on	cast(C.Timeline3_DecisionIssuedDate as date) = d_dd.date

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_ta
	on	cast(C.Timeline4_caseTurnedAwayDate as date) = d_ta.date

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_wd
	on	cast(C.Timeline4_caseWithdrawnDate as date) = d_wd.date

	left outer join Live.dim_date as d_vd
	on	cast(C.Timeline1_ValidationDate as date) = d_vd.date

	left outer join live.dim_local_planning_authority as lpa
	on	C.Application_LPA = lpa.lpa_code

	left outer join Live.dim_processing_state_combined as ps
	on	CFG3.[Name] = ps.processing_state_p

	left outer join Live.dim_open_processing_stage ops
		on ps.open_processing_stage = ops.open_processing_stage_sub_category

	left outer join live.dim_postcode_region as pr
	on	case
			when len(ltrim(rtrim(replace(replace(C.Site_Postcode, ' ', ''), '(Nearest)', '')))) < 5 then ltrim(rtrim(replace(replace(C.Site_Postcode, ' ', ''), '(Nearest)', '')))
			else left(replace(C.Site_Postcode, ' ', ''), len(ltrim(rtrim(replace(replace(C.Site_Postcode, ' ', ''), '(Nearest)', '')))) -3)
		end = pr.outbound_postcode

	left outer join Live.dim_spec_level as sl
		on	C.Allocations_Grade = sl.spec_level_code

	left outer join Live.dim_case_officer as co
	on	U4.FullName = co.case_officer_name
	
	left outer join load.BIS_Hzn_Inspector_Cases
		on ad1.appeal_reference_number = BIS_Hzn_Inspector_Cases.AppealRefNumber

	left outer join load.sp_list_inspector_map
		on BIS_Hzn_Inspector_Cases.ContactID = sp_list_inspector_map.HorizonID

	left outer join live.dim_inspector ins2
		on sp_list_inspector_map.StaffNumber = ins2.pins_staff_number

	left outer join (select distinct 
						rank () over(partition by dim_appeal_key order by timesheet_date desc, first_submission_date desc, input_date desc, timesheet_hours desc) as ranking, 
						dim_appeal_key, 
						dim_inspector_key
					from live.fact_timesheet_combined
					) timesheet
	on ad1.dim_appeal_key = timesheet.dim_appeal_key
	and timesheet.ranking = 1
	
	left outer join live.dim_inspector ins
	on timesheet.dim_inspector_key = ins.dim_inspector_key
	and timesheet.ranking = 1
	--on ROO3.[Name] = ins.given_names + ' ' + ins.family_name

	left outer join live.dim_appeal_type as appet
	on	ISNULL(Application_caseType, '100-MVP') = appet.appeal_type_code_picaso
	--Kludge to deal with multiple s78 Picaso Appeal Types
	left outer join live.dim_target as t
		on	case appet.appeal_type_code 
				when '834-RPC' then 'PA'
				when '840-OCF' then 'PA'
				when '841-PRI' then 'PA'
				when '842-RAP' then 'PA'
				when '845-NDE' then 'PA'
				when '847-DIS' then 'PA'
				when '851-LBC' then 'PA'
				when '844-CON' then 'PA'
				when '851-CAV' then 'CAS'
				when '3566-HAS' then 'HAS'
				else appet.appeal_type_code
		end = t.appeal_type_code
		and CASE C.Preferred_Preference
			WHEN 'Written Representations' THEN 'WR'
			WHEN 'Hearing' THEN 'IH'
			WHEN 'Inquiry' THEN 'LI'
			WHEN 'No Preference' THEN 'Un'
			ELSE 'NA'		
		END = t.procedure_code

	left outer join live.dim_procedure as p
		on case C.Preferred_Preference
			when 'Written Representations' then 'WR'
			when 'Hearing' then 'IH'
			when 'Inquiry' then 'LI'
			when 'No Preference' then 'Un'
			else 'NA'		
		end = p.procedure_code
	--/MP-1373

--Bodged Jurisdiction = PINS
left outer join Live.dim_jurisdiction as j
on	'0' = j.jurisdiction_code

left outer join
	(select
		[Job Id]
		,min([Inspector Submit Date]) as first_submission_date
		,max([Inspector Submit Date]) as last_submission_date
		,count(*) as quantity_of_submissions
	from load.mwr_status
	group by
		[Job Id]) as sub
on cast(replace(replace(C.[caseNumber],'W/', ''), 'D/', '') as varchar) = sub.[Job Id]

left outer join Live.dim_date as last_submit_date
on cast(sub.last_submission_date AS date) = last_submit_date.date

/* Bodge to match only the first listed development_type_name_picaso */
left outer join live.dim_development_type as dt
on case charindex(',',C.[Application_PlanningType])
		when NULL then NULL
		when 0 then C.[Application_PlanningType]
		else LEFT(C.[Application_PlanningType],charindex(',',C.[Application_PlanningType])-1)
	end = dt.development_type_name_picaso

left outer join Live.dim_date as first_submit_date
on cast(sub.first_submission_date AS date) = first_submit_date.date

inner join #Picaso P2 on REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(C.[CaseNumber],'W/', ''), 'D/', ''), 'BC', ''), 'H/', ''), 'Z/', ''), 'EN', ''), 'Y/','') = P2.appeal_reference_number

If(OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Picaso') Is Not Null)
Begin
    Drop Table #Picaso
End
